privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At WishBubble, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, create a wishlist, or contact us for support. This includes your name, email address, and any content you create on our platform.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to personalize your experience.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting and email delivery.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to processing or request data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. See our Cookie Policy for more details.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@wishbubble.app.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to WishBubble. By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using WishBubble, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.

account.title: Your Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. You must provide accurate information when creating an account.

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of content you create. By posting content, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute it in connection with our services.

conduct.title: Acceptable Use
conduct.content: You agree not to use our service for any unlawful purpose, to harass others, to post harmful content, or to attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these Terms. You may also delete your account at any time.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, WishBubble shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how WishBubble uses cookies and similar technologies.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience.

items.necessary: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function properly (e.g., authentication, security).
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site (e.g., pages visited, time spent).
items.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences (e.g., language, theme).
items.marketing: Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements (only with your consent).

control.title: Managing Cookies
control.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We use services like Google Analytics that may set their own cookies. These third parties have their own privacy policies.
